name: Ballyvourney (Jig)
description:
This set is from West County Cork, Ireland.
Swing: For Figures One through Five, swing in waltz or hug (right hands on partner’s right upper waist, left hands on partner’s upper right arm) hold.
The set is often danced with no pause.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: With waltz hold, the 1st step being danced slightly anti-clockwise before beginning the house on the second step.

movements.name: Square the house
movements.description: Couples slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple on the R, make a ¼ turn clockwise and slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple opposite their own place and house back home.

movements.name: Slide and change
movements.description: Partners take waltz hold and slide towards the centre 1, 2, 123 and back, 2, 123 (4 bars) and house across to the opposite place (4 bars). They then repeat this movement back home.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: With waltz hold, the 1st step being danced slightly anti-clockwise before beginning the house on the second step.

movements.name: Square the house
movements.description: Couples slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple on the R, make a ¼ turn clockwise and slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple opposite their own place and house back home.

movements.name: Swing opposites
movements.description: Gents cross to the opposite lady (2 steps) and swing.

movements.name: Swing partners
movements.description: Gents dance back and swing partners.

movements.name: Slide and change
movements.description: Partners take waltz hold and slide towards the centre 1, 2, 123 and back, 2, 123 (4 bars) and house across to the opposite place (4 bars). They then repeat this movement back home.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: With waltz hold, the 1st step being danced slightly anti-clockwise before beginning the house on the second step.

movements.name: Square the house
movements.description: Couples slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple on the R, make a ¼ turn clockwise and slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple opposite their own place and house back home.

movements.name: Double Swing Four
movements.description: Both couples join hands behind each other’s backs and swing clockwise, falling back to place on the last 2 bars.

movements.name: Slide and change
movements.description: Partners take waltz hold and slide towards the centre 1, 2, 123 and back, 2, 123 (4 bars) and house across to the opposite place (4 bars). They then repeat this movement back home.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: With waltz hold, the 1st step being danced slightly anti-clockwise before beginning the house on the second step.

movements.name: Square the house
movements.description: Couples slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple on the R, make a ¼ turn clockwise and slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple opposite their own place and house back home.

movements.name: Swing all Round
movements.description: Gents swing the lady on the L for 8 bars, move on and swing the next lady and so on to swing their own partners in place to finish.

movements.name: Slide and change
movements.description: Partners take waltz hold and slide towards the centre 1, 2, 123 and back, 2, 123 (4 bars) and house across to the opposite place (4 bars). They then repeat this movement back home.

movements.name: House around
movements.description: With waltz hold, the 1st step being danced slightly anti-clockwise before beginning the house on the second step.

movements.name: Square the house
movements.description: Couples slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple on the R, make a ¼ turn clockwise and slide 1, 2, 123 towards the couple opposite their own place and house back home.

movements.name: Half chain
movements.description: All face partners and, taking R arm, dance ½ turn around each other to face in the opposite direction.  All chain L arm, R arm etc. to meet partners in the opposite place.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: All face partners and, taking R arm, dance ½ turn around each other to face in the opposite direction.  All chain L arm, R arm etc. to meet partners in the opposite place.

movements.name: Full slide
movements.description: All couples slide to the centre and back and half house around into their own place. They repeat this movement back to the place opposite their own.
